data.name: mpqc
data.description: The Massively Parallel Quantum Chemistry program, MPQC, computes properties of atoms and molecules from first principles using the time independent Schr√∂dinger equation.

evidence: "The Massively Parallel Quantum Chemistry (MPQC) platform is a research package for *ab initio* simulation of the electronic structure of molecules and periodic solids."
"MPQC is developed by the [Valeev Group](http://research.valeyev.net) at [Virginia Tech](http://www.vt.edu)."

README presents MPQC as a research package/platform with no mention of package managers or binaries; distribution is via the GitHub repository (badges, logo, and documentation all reference the repo).
